metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value: METROPOITAN Council  Meeting, Friday, October 20., 1944, 5:30 P.M.  Green Room, Dock Street Theatre  Mrs. wing presiding,  Mrs. wing opens meeting with outine of objectives of Cvic  Services Committee reading from etter.  Mrs. wing cas on Mrs. Waring.  Mrs. Waring expains why we are doing po.  Mrs. wing cas on Whitelaw.  Whitelaw instructs interviewers as to methods, cas on  Mrs. Waring to distribute 400 polls as follows:  40 to 4 interviewers for area north of city  40 to 4 interviewers for area west of Ashley  320 to 32 interviewers for Charleston  The city polls are divided into 32 areas.  Each interviewer receives [a] 10 pos,  [b] instruction sheet containing area number and street numbers,  [c]2 reprints of announcement of metropolitan Counci.  Whitelawreads po and instruction sheet and sets final date of   noon, Friday, October 2?th.  Whitelaw and Mrs. Waring answer questions.
